data.name: Erannorth Chronicles - Relics and Armaments
data.detailed_description: Enrich your builds with the second Erannorth Chronicles expansion. "Relics and Armaments" will offer you new equipment options, consumables, and loot suitable for mid to high-level characters.
data.about_the_game: Enrich your builds with the second Erannorth Chronicles expansion. "Relics and Armaments" will offer you new equipment options, consumables, and loot suitable for mid to high-level characters.
data.short_description: Enrich your builds with the second Erannorth Chronicles expansion. "Relics and Armaments" will offer you new equipment options, consumables, and loot suitable for mid to high-level characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 16/9 resolutions are supported in full screen.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64bit
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX12 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 16/9 resolutions are supported in full screen.
